General.Name: Müller - Die lila Logistik AG
General.Description: Müller - Die lila Logistik SE provides logistics services in Germany. The company operates through Lila Operating and Lila Real Estate segments. It offers logistics solutions, such as delivery, warehousing, and assembling; and real estate space for the provision of services, including development, building, managing, and optimizing. The company serves automotive, medical and pharma, consumer goods, industrial, and electronics. Müller - Die lila Logistik SE was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Besigheim, Germany.
